DOC.criteria: ≥ 18 year age Both gender Currently prescribe fix pressure CPAP APAP treatment OSA Currently CPAP pillow nasal mask user Patients adherent define conventional standard ( i.e . 4 hour per night/70 % night ) Unwilling wear AVEERA Concern privacy data Pregnant Full face mask user Any medical condition deem investigator pose issue subject 's participation .
